Class ImageController

java.lang.Object
controller.ImageController
public class ImageController extends Object
Controller that coordinates image uploads, analysis, and result retrieval.

This controller acts as the main orchestrator for image-related operations, coordinating between the image analyzer service, storage service, and view. It handles the workflow of uploading an image, analyzing it for labels, and storing/retrieving/displaying the results.

Version:
1.0
Author:
VisionTagger Team

  • Constructor Details

    • ImageController

      public ImageController(ImageAnalyzerService analyzerService, View view)
      Constructs an ImageController with the specified services and view. This allows guest users to process images without persisting results.
      Parameters:
      analyzerService - the service for analyzing images
      view - the view for displaying results
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either parameter is null

    • ImageController

      public ImageController(ImageAnalyzerService analyzerService, FileStorageService storageService, View view)
      Constructs an ImageController with analyzer, view, and storage service. This allows registered users to have their results persisted.
      Parameters:
      analyzerService - the service for analyzing images
      storageService - the service for storing and retrieving results
      view - the view for displaying results
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

    • ImageController

      public ImageController(ImageAnalyzerService analyzerService, FileStorageService storageService)
      Constructs an ImageController with the specified analyzer and storage services. This constructor allows creating a controller without specifying a view, which may be required for legacy code or non-interactive terminal usage.
      Parameters:
      analyzerService - the service for analyzing images
      storageService - the service for storing and retrieving results
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either service is null

  • Method Details

    • uploadAndAnalyzeImage

      public DetectionResult uploadAndAnalyzeImage(User user, String filePath, String description)
      Handles the image upload and triggers detection analysis.

      This method performs the complete workflow:

      1. Creates an Image object from the provided parameters
      2. Analyzes the image using the analyzer service
      3. Saves the detection result to storage (if storage service is available)
      4. Returns the result
      Parameters:
      user - the user uploading the image (must not be null)
      filePath - the path or URI of the image file (must not be null or empty)
      description - optional description of the image (can be null)
      Returns:
      the DetectionResult containing detected labels
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user is null, or filePath is null/empty

    • getDetectionResult

      public Optional<DetectionResult> getDetectionResult(String imageId)
      Retrieves a detection result by image ID.
      Parameters:
      imageId - the unique ID of the image
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the DetectionResult if found, empty otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if imageId is null or empty
      IllegalStateException - if storage service is not available

    • listUserResults

      public List<DetectionResult> listUserResults(User user)
      Lists all detection results for a user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to retrieve results for
      Returns:
      a list of DetectionResult objects for the user, empty list if none found
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user is null
      IllegalStateException - if storage service is not available

    • process

      public void process(String filePath)
      Processes an image file: analyzes it and displays the results using the view.

      This is a simplified workflow that:

      1. Creates a guest user for the operation
      2. Analyzes the image
      3. Displays the result using the configured view
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the image file (must not be null or empty)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if filePath is null or empty
      IllegalStateException - if view is not available

    • processForUser

      public DetectionResult processForUser(User user, String filePath, String description)
      Processes an image file for a specific user: analyzes it, saves it (if registered), and displays the results.

      This method:

      1. Analyzes the image
      2. Saves the result to storage if user is registered and storage is available
      3. Displays the result using the configured view
      Parameters:
      user - the user processing the image (must not be null)
      filePath - the path to the image file (must not be null or empty)
      description - optional description of the image
      Returns:
      the DetectionResult containing detected labels
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user is null, or filePath is null/empty
      IllegalStateException - if view is not available

    • displayUserHistory

      public void displayUserHistory(User user)
      Displays all saved results for a user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to retrieve results for
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user is null
      IllegalStateException - if storage service is not available
